roleset.name: deserve

example.name: verbal thing deserved
example.text: But she did n't deserve to have her head chopped off .

propbank.arg: to have her head chopped off

example.name: with reason
example.text: `` I deserve something for my loyalty , '' she says .

example.name: not all causes are arg2
example.text: Democrats argue that Costa Rica deserves more assistance for the same reason that Mr. Bush is attending the celebration this weekend : to reward the country for its stability in a region wracked with turmoil and for its efforts to promote peace in Nicaragua .

propbank.arg: for the same reason that Mr. Bush is attending the celebration this weekend : to reward the country for its stability in a region wracked with turmoil and for its efforts to promote peace in Nicaragua

example.name: Adjectival rel: deserving; subject arg2
example.text: The account of the facts for whether it is a crime or not may be debatable , but the crime is absolutely not deserving of death , is it ... ? !

roleset.note: DESERVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'deserve' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'deserving' based on BOLT-6. No Verbnet entry. (from deserve.01-v)
DESERVING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from deserving.01-j)
